Nightshift gasps and out of reflex, he springs into the air toward the quee=
n in an attempt to distract her.

" Don't even go there, ya ugly bug!  Bats=
cout, move it!  Get outa here!"

Don't be envious of what you don't have, b=
e grateful for things you already posses.  Nothing is worth more than famil=
y and friends.

On Dec 1, 2011, at 12:30 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@=
gmail.com> wrote:

e was a nod from BATSCOUT as he flew around the corner.

 leader is here." The QUEEN said as she stood in the
> room, wind and snow =
swirling around her and beginning to coat the room

hat is except for the honeycomb structure which
> continued to glow and swa=
y.

> The QUEEN chuckled darkly as she looked at NIGHTSHIFT, amusement

clearly written on her insect features, "I knew that someone else was

lking around here!"
> She laughed, the wind giving her voice a crazed sound=

"Ahh yes, yo=
ur leader is here." The QUEEN said as she stood in the<br>
room, wind and s=
now swirling around her and beginning to coat the room<br>

ite, that is except for the honeycomb structure which<br>
